results.definition: the first of two or the first mentioned of two
examples: Tom and Dick were both heroes but only the former is remembered today

results.definition: referring to the first of two things or persons mentioned (or the earlier one or ones of several); I prefer the former version to the latter one"
examples: the novel was made into a film in 1943 and again in 1967
the once capital of the state

results.definition: (used especially of persons) of the immediate past
examples: our late President is still very active
the previous occupant of the White House
